name: Juan Ruiz
summary: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience designing, developing, and deploying enterprise-grade web applications and AI-powered solutions in retail, insurance, logistics, and enterprise systems. Proficient in ASP.NET Core (C#), Node.js, React.js, Next.js, and Angular, with extensive experience integrating Python/FastAPI for LLMs, NLP models, and AI pipelines to enable automation and predictive analytics. Skilled in RESTful and GraphQL API design, microservices, event-driven architectures, database design (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB), and cloud deployments (Azure, AWS). Strong expertise in unit and integration testing (xUnit, NUnit, Jest, PyTest), CI/CD automation, DevOps practices, performance optimization, and application security. Experienced in secure authentication, role-based access control, encryption, and compliance standards (OWASP, GDPR, PCI DSS). Adept at collaborating in Agile environments, mentoring teams, and delivering scalable, maintainable, high-performance applications.
skills: Azure (App Service, AKS, Functions, SQL, Service Bus, Storage, Application Insights)

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and led development of scalable web applications using ASP.NET Core (C#), Node.js, React.js, and Next.js, delivering dynamic, responsive interfaces for complex business workflows and customer-facing platforms.
Integrated Python-based AI solutions including LLMs and NLP models into backend services for content personalization, predictive analytics, and workflow automation.
Designed and optimized database schemas and queries in SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB, supporting high-volume transactional and analytical workloads with data integrity and security.
Implemented comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using xUnit, NUnit, Jest, Supertest, and PyTest, improving reliability and reducing production issues by over 35%.

Enhanced application performance and security through profiling, caching strategies, CDN optimization, encryption at rest and in transit, and OWASP-based security practices, reducing page load times and API latency by 40%.
Led cloud-native deployments on Azure and AWS, including App Services, AKS, and serverless functions, using Docker, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines for secure, repeatable releases.
Integrated external APIs and third-party services for analytics, notifications, and operational insights, enabling predictive and secure decision-making.
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and improved CI/CD workflows, fostering best practices in version control, automated testing, DevOps, and security compliance.
